name: campusnav
description: CampusNav is a campus-specific navigation platform that helps students, freshers, and visitors easily locate and navigate key places within a university environment. Built on top of Google Maps, CampusNav adds student context, localized naming, and community insights that traditional map services often miss.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
